TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DisplayClaim extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks Usually, the display tag (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property) and the description (the Description property) are localized. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property identifies different claim types. The display value (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A> property) is the string representation of the claim.Resource.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string claimType) cil managed

Docs.param: The claim type for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified claim type.

MemberSignature.Value: public DisplayClaim (string claimType, string displayTag, string description);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string claimType, string displayTag, string description) cil managed

Docs.param: The claim type for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property.
The description for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified claim type, display name, and description.

MemberSignature.Value: public DisplayClaim (string claimType, string displayTag, string description, string displayValue);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string claimType, string displayTag, string description, string displayValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The claim type for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property.
The description for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> property.
The display value for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified claim type, display name, display value, and description. The claim is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional%2A> property is initialized to `true` in the new instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public DisplayClaim (string claimType, string displayTag, string description, string displayValue, bool optional);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string claimType, string displayTag, string description, string displayValue, bool optional) cil managed

Docs.param: The claim type for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property.
The description for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> property.
The display value for the display claim. Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A> property.
if the claim is optional; otherwise, . Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified claim type, display name, display value, description, and optional attribute.
Gets the claim type associated with the display claim.
Docs.value: A URI that represents the claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This required attribute provides the unique identifier (URI) of the individual claim returned in the security token

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim CreateDisplayClaimFromClaimType(string claimType) cil managed

Docs.param: The URI that represents the claim type.
Docs.summary: Creates a display claim from the specified claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> properties are set to default values based on the specified claim type. If default values do not exist for the properties, they are set to `null`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a description for the display claim.
Docs.value: The description for the display claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This optional element provides a description of the semantics for the claim returned in the security token.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the friendly name for the display claim.
Docs.value: The friendly name for the display claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This optional element provides a friendly name for the claim returned in the security token.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a displayable value for the display claim.
Docs.value: The displayable value for the display claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This optional element provides one or more displayable values for the claim returned in the security token.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the optional attribute for the display claim
Docs.value: if the display claim is optional; otherwise, . The default is .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the optional attribute will be serialized.
Docs.value: to serialize the optional attribute; otherwise, false. The default value is .
